_header: His sign is a star birth
_description: An Epiphany carol — three quatrains (aaab) with ‘Iluminare Jerusalem’ refrain and burden: ‘Illuminare jherusalem / The duke aperyth in bedlem’

BLEge3307.First Lines:
Hys signe ys a ster brythþat shyneth ouer hym wyth
                    lyȝt…
BLEge3307.Last Lines:
…Þis ys my son me plese hym ryghtIlluminare
                    Ierusalem
BLEge3307.Editions:
Stevens,  John,
                        ed.  
             Mediaeval Carols.
Musica Britannica
         4. London: Stainer and Bell, 1952, 2nd ed. 1958: 43.
Greene,  Richard Leighton,
                        ed.  
             A Selection of English Carols.
Clarendon Medieval and Tudor Series.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1962: 90; 1977, 76.
